result.execSummary:
The defendant Bonita Mischelle Turner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bonita Mischelle Turner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 10:39 am case called. Defendant Bonita Mischelle Turner in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court withdraws warrant previously issued & vacated default judgment entered regarding the TR matter. Statement by DA Blader regarding resolution.   Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: No Contest to 15CM312. Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Court dismisses and reads-in 15TR2088. Court sentences the defendant to: 1 days WCJ with 1 day credit for time served. Costs to be paid within 60 days or payment plan. DNA sample to be provided. Appeal Rights Given.

10:18 am case called. Defendant Bonita Mischelle Turner not in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court authorizes issuance of warrant, State of Wiscons. Court enters default judgment on 15TR2088- $250.90 to be paid within 60 days, subject to contempt.
No operation of any motor vehicles without a valid driver's license.

Case Called @ 1:18 PM: Defendant Bonita Mischelle Turner in court, in custody, with attorney Ben Szilagyi, both appearing via video.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived. Eligibility will determine custody status.  DA argues for Signature Bond of $500.00.  DA requests clarification of legal identity due to many AKA's.  No objection by SPD as to Bond requested by State.  Def confirms legal name of  Bonita Michele Turner.  NGP received and entered.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Court notes Def is not eligible to reinstate until sometime in April of 2016.   SPD states that there currently is a valid Occ DL.  Court advises Def that she will no longer be eligible for SPD services.  Def intends to retatin her own counsel.  Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 09:40 am.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
